definition: Yangyuan county in Zhangjiakou 張家口|张家口[Zhang1 jia1 kou3], Hebei
Yangyuan county in Zhangjiakou 張家口|张家口[Zhang1 jia1 kou3], Hebei

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the current status of endemic fluorosis in Yangyuan County.
sentences.chinese: 目的掌握河北省陽原縣地方性氟中毒流行現況。

sentences.english: This paper is to discuss the paleoclimate evolution by analysing clay minerals in eight samples from the Yangyuan Basin.
sentences.chinese: 本文用粘土礦物特徵來論述陽原盆地古氣候演變。
